attributes.description:
2021 Toyota Land Cruiser 79 4.5D V8 LX Double Cab (Sand Beige)
ONLY 23300km!!
Extras worth around R 615 000 !!
Extras include: Full Tough Dog suspension with steering damper(R38k), Alu Innovations Camper unit with 12V cooling fan, USB charging points, Storage pockets, and cabinets, Integrated tent, 270 degree awning, 12V Shower, Storage cupboard rear, Fridge slide(R300k), Ironman 4x4 offroad front bumper(R25k), 12000lbs winch with Dyneema tow rope and soft shackle(R15k), Hard Korr LED spots(R10k), Bushcutters(R1.5k), Stofpad rocksliders(R11k), Front Runner roofrack(R8k), 80 liter watertank(R11k), Dual battery system(R10k), 12V Oven voltage booster(R3.5k), Solar panel(R1k), Victron solar controller, DC charger, Multiplus Inverter(R15k), Distribution board 12V, 220V power outlet, Shore power plug point(R8k), 200ah 12V lithium auxillary battery(R6.5k), 130 liter Brown Davis long range fuel tank(R28k), National Luna 60liter fridge(R11k), Road chef 12V Oven(R5k), Single plate gas burner and bottle(R1k), Pots & pan, 4 place crockery and cutlery(R1.5k), Cruise control and auto door lock(R12k), Canvas seat covers(R6k), Centre tray(R2k), IXXIV roof console(R5k), Spare wheel crane(R8k), Compressor(R3k), High lift jack kit(R3.5k), 4 x BF Goodrich tyres(R16k).
One owner, Full service history agents, Balance of service plan(R50k), Balance of factory warranty, Spare keys, Accident free!
Also: Aircon, Radio, Navigation, Bluetooth, USB, HDMI, Apps, 4x4, Low range, Dual diff-lock, ABS, Dual airbags, Elec windows, Central locking, Alarm, Snorkel, Mags.
AN ABSOLUTE MUST SEE!
R1499950

attributes.description:
All vehicles are available for CASH,FINANCE AND RENT TO OWN ON SELECTED CARS. Roadworthy are subject to payment for Change of ownership. Our finance is done through all major banks with an additional administrative charge of  R10.000- R15.000 depending on the car. Trade-ins are also accepted , delivery is nationwide and fees are charged based on location. Buying a used car from us means buying Peace of mind, Quality, Choice and Value. 
PRE-OWNED CAR DEALERSHIP IN GAUTENG JOHANNESBURG WITH VEHICLES IN EXCELLENT CONDITION. YOU CAN COME THROUGH TO OUR DEALERSHIP AT NO. 6 JOUBERT STREET AND CORNER ALBERT, BEHIND SARS OFFICES. PLEASE DO CONTACT OUR EXECUTIVE SALES REP. VUYO ON 0763933070 OR CALL ON 0100234810. 

THANK YOU. SIYABONGA. KEALEBOHA. DANKIE.
